panels.description: CPU usage of all selected containers in cores
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: CPU requests of all selected containers in cores
panels.title: CPU requests

panels.description: CPU limits of all selected containers in cores
panels.title: CPU limits

panels.description: MEM wss usage of all selected containers in bytes
panels.title: MEM usage

panels.description: MEM requests of all selected containers in bytes
panels.title: MEM requests

panels.description: MEM limits of all selected containers in bytes
panels.title: MEM limits

panels.description: Number of all selected containers in running state
panels.title: Running

panels.description: Number of all selected containers in waiting state
panels.title: Waiting

panels.description: Number of restarts for all selected containers
panels.title: Restarts

targets.expr: sum by (pod, container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"})
sum by (pod, container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"})
sum by (pod, container)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"})
sum by (pod, container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",unit="byte", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"})

panels.description: CPU usage per selected container type in cores
panels.title: CPU usage containers

panels.description: CPU usage of all selected containers in cores
panels.title: CPU usage total

panels.description: CPU CFS stats per selected container type in CFS period
panels.title: CPU CFS containers

panels.description: CPU CFS stats of all selected containers in CFS period
panels.title: CPU CFS total

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"}[2m])) by (pod,container) * 100 / scalar(max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"}))

panels.description: MEM WSS (working set size) usage usage of all selected containers in bytes. WSS is the total physical memory (RAM) used by the process, this also includes memory-mapped files and various other resources,
panels.title: Mem WSS total

panels.description: MEM usage per selected container type in bytes
panels.title: Mem usage

panels.description: MEM max usage per selected container type in bytes. Max usage is maximum memory usage recorded in bytes.
panels.title: Mem  max usage

panels.description: MEM WSS (working set size) per selected container type in bytes. WSS is the total physical memory (RAM) used by the process, this also includes memory-mapped files and various other resources,
panels.title: Mem WSS usage

panels.description:
MEM cached per selected container type in bytes.
Cached is number of bytes of page cache memory.
panels.title: Mem cached

panels.description: MEM RSS usage per selected container type in bytes
panels.title: Mem RSS

panels.description: MEM fail count per selected container type in bytes
panels.title: Mem fail count

targets.expr: (container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"}) * 100 / scalar(max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte", cluster="$Cluster", namespace="$Namespace", pod=~"($Pods).+", container=~"($Containers)"}))

panels.description: Bandwith per selected container type in bytes/s
panels.title: Filesystem Bandwith

panels.description: Bandwith per selected container type in bytes/s
panels.title: Filesystem Throughput
